name: Nova Lancer - Privateer
description:
Nova LancerPrivateer EditionYou are a lancer, a privateer working for the corporations on the borders of lawful space. While companies funnel their earnings to establish control in an ever-changing galaxy, you begin receiving mission requests from an anonymous hacker who refers to herself as "Nova".

NOTE: Originally released on Xbox Live Indie Games in 2010, the Privateer Edition features a full graphical overhaul.Features
  • 23 ships to purchase and fight against
  • A campaign of 23 missions across the galaxy
  • Ammunition, shields and armor power-ups
